name: Manuscript v2
description:
Manuscript v2

Controls:

Up/Down - moves notehead up/down by one note
T - treble clef
B - bass clef
R - random note
N - show/hide note name
L - show/hide mnemonic for "lines" of that clef
S - show/hide mnemonic for "spaces" of that clef

v0.1

Uploaded basic version!

v0.2

Added mouse click controls

Changed screen display resolution
